name: Evil Nurse: Mental Hospital
description:
She HEARS EVERYTHING !!
The story scary nurse horror survival Games revolves around how smartly you play because you have five days to escape from the scary nurse hospital. Imagine yourself suddenly locked in old building hospital where nobody can live. Now you want to save yourself the hospital is completely locked and you find the key. Remember key is nurse's custody and it is not easy to take it. You will find many hurdles to find out the key, but search quietly everything spread here and their quietly search key in drawers and cupboards to open the apartments. You are very criminal minded. The mysterious hospital is empty that is a horror environment, scary nurse is looking after this hospital for many years you must save from her.

Features:

-Extraordinary atmosphere with horror sound.
-Fear and death pester to you in every step
-Face many hurdles to find out the key
-Thrilling and challenging Missions
-Challenging missions with smooth and easy controls
